name: Samantha Swift and the Fountains of Fate
name_original: Samantha Swift and the Fountains of Fate
description:
Samantha Swift and the Fountains of Fate is an adventure-puzzle game developed by MumboJumbo. It came out on 06-08-2010. It was published by MumboJumbo.
You can play Samantha Swift and the Fountains of Fate on PC and iOS. The game is sold via App Store.
